subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[bundle]] up; to [[bind]]
# {{†}} [[rope]]; [[cord]]
# {{†}} to [[restrain]]; to [[limit]]; to [[keep]] under [[control]]
# to [[make]] an [[appointment]]; to [[arrange]]
# [[appointment]]; [[meeting]]; [[arrangement]]
# [[treaty]]; [[agreement]]; [[covenant]]; [[pact]]
# to [[invite]] or [[ask]] [[in advance]]
#* {{zh-x|我 想 約 你 明天 一起 去 吃飯，不 知道 你 有 沒有 時間。|I'd like to '''invite''' you out to have a meal tomorrow, if you have the time.}}
# {{†}} to [[hinder]]; to [[block]]
# {{†}} to [[save]]; to [[economise]]
# {{†}} [[frugal]]; [[economical]]; [[thrifty]]
# {{†}} [[brief]]; [[concise]]; [[succinct]]
# {{†}} [[poor]]; [[humble]]; [[low]]-[[ranking]]
# {{lb|zh|mathematics}} to [[reduce]] (a fraction)
# {{†}} to [[prepare]]; to [[equip]]
# {{†}} to [[seek]]; to [[pursue]]
# {{†}} to [[estimate]]; to [[approximate]]; to [[reckon]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[weigh]]; to weigh on a [[balance]] or [[scale]]
# [[about]]; [[approximately]]
#* {{zh-x|約 @220 大卡|'''Approximately''' 220 kilocalories.}}
